ActorTalk: ...We found... our missing spices... in your restaurant's... hamburgers. How... do you explain that!
Ocean Heart always makes its own seasonings! Don't go spreading lies and ruining our reputation, rawr!
After comparing... the samples matched... 96.87%! You clearly... stole... Akdilek's spices!
Impossible! Every ingredient in this store is properly sourced and logged, rawr!
[PlayerName]! You're just in time... Please... help us settle thisâ€”
A few days ago... we lost a batch... of special spices. But today... we found them... in Ocean Heart's burgers.
If we really stole them, why would we display them so openly, rawr?!
Gray Raven Commandant, could you investigate this case? I swear, Ocean Heart didn't steal anything, rawr!
If you can prove our innocence, Ocean Heart's flagship store will join the committee, rawr!
If you find out... who really stole the spices... we'll join too.
Both sides are talking past each other. This shouting won't solve anything. Shall we accept their request, Commandant?
Of course. It's in the best interest of the square.
I'll start investigating right away. Where were the spices stolen from?
The guild... has a warehouse... Coordinates sent... Surveillance was... jammed during the theft.
Please... Commandant... we're counting on you... to find out what happened.
Everyone, calm down. Let's resolve this peacefully.
Something does seem fishy about this.
